title: PAME Teachers: Unfortunately the end of the downhill is not the ... bottom!
content:
To interfere with the DAKE and the interventions and the secondary management in Thessaloniki to ignore the lawsuit addressed to the Dakites calling for apology for the well -known "inappropriate behavior" only the unionists of the interventions because they have ... To… fall from the clouds!



Alas if he called for apology the bodies of government policy in education! It would be beyond the nature of the addresses that implement government policy.
Logically it should not make us fall out of the clouds, nor the attitude of PAME teachers who at all the general assemblies in Thessaloniki refused to vote for the support resolution by preferring his own calling for the "two parts" to withdraw the lawsuits by ignoring how she At the moment there are persecuted colleagues!
Because it is another thing -politically -contradiction of lawsuits for trade unionism and a completely different thing is state prosecution. Which of course is unilateral!
And it should not make us fall from the clouds this attitude because there have been even greater monsters and points of submission to the policy of repression in education.
Example of Piraeus (see article Kavvadia on what's going on "down in Piraeus").
There, the majority of the Board of Directors of ELME Piraeus, while the primary unions are mobilized to support colleagues who, with a variety of reports, crawl down the discipline refuses to participate in the mobilizations. So who? The club to which the persecuted belongs!
At the beginning of the school year he negotiated the withdrawal of some persecutions with the then Deputy Minister of our heart Michael. And he considered it a victory. The "commitments" that some of the persecutions can freeze!
But he froze every mobilization that would put on the streets the opposition of colleagues to persecution and repression.
It goes - or the majority of the Board of Directors - and even in a downfall (see again in the relevant article) that extracts the Piraeus Secondary Administration and even gives them intention to prevent the strike abstaining in its schools of responsibility. Hammarton!
Who has the majority in the Board of Directors of ELME Piraeus? PAME!

With the partnership who made the decision?
With the trade union form of Syriza.
And let's also have the persecuted member of PAME.
So along with Syriza, there are those who want to become Syriza in the place of Syriza!
Why else to explain an attitude that does not ... make us fall from the clouds but on the contrary it manifests itself in a variety of ways?
What signal does this attitude give the system?
Message of subordination and compliance.
As appropriate in a party of "housewives". "Responsible trade unionism" you will tell me ...
That is, non -trade unionism.
The end of the downhill is not the bottom when it comes to such a downside!

Dimitris Manos Member of the Teachers' Racing Movements.
author: ΣΤΕΦΑΝΟΣ
